description: Number of planar planted trees with n non-root nodes and every 2-valent node isolated.
comments: Isolated 2-valent node is a 2-valent node non-adjacent to any other 2-valent node.Hankel transform of a(n+1) is A174108. Binomial transform of a(n+1) is A174107. [From _Paul Barry_, Mar 07 2010]
references: I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration, Wiley, N.Y., 1983, (Problem 2.7.4).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jun 13 2001
